5.3 DUIM-Sheets Module

$shift-key

Constant

Summary

A constant that represents the SHIFT key on the keyboard.

Type

<integer>

Value

ash(1, %modifier_base + 0);

Library

duim-sheets

Module

duim-sheets

Description

A constant that represents the SHIFT key on the keyboard.

See also
